content.prompt: Which of the following declarations is the most appropriate for the  Profile  class?

choices.label:
private class Profile
{ 
   private String name; 
   private String username; 
   private int followers;
}

public class Profile
{ 
   public String name; 
   public String username; 
   public int followers;
}

public class Profile
{ 
   private String name; 
   private String username; 
   private int followers;
}

private class Profile
{ 
   private String name; 
   private String username; 
   private int followers;
}

skill.text: 2.B: Write program code involving data abstractions.
